tool_description: Validates reading progress claims against book metadata and user reading history to ensure accuracy and prevent errors.

book_title.description: Title of the book to validate progress for

claimed_pages.description: Number of pages user claims to have read

total_book_pages.description: Total number of pages in the book

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user making the claim

reading_session_duration.description: Duration of reading session in minutes

error_messages: Invalid book_title: Book title cannot be empty
Invalid claimed_pages: Must be a positive integer
Invalid total_book_pages: Must be a positive integer
Invalid user_id: User identifier cannot be empty
Pages exceed book length: Claimed pages cannot exceed total book pages
Unrealistic reading speed: Claimed progress inconsistent with typical reading speeds
Invalid session_duration: Must be a positive integer if provided
usage: Provide book_title, claimed_pages, total_book_pages, and user_id to validate reading progress. Optionally include reading_session_duration for speed validation.

validation_result.description: Whether the claimed progress is valid

warnings.description: List of validation warnings if any

suggested_pages.description: Suggested realistic page count if original claim was rejected

validation_notes.description: Additional notes about the validation process
